name: TechConnect
overview:
Whether you are looking for premium online advertising, quality publishing for all walks of life, or cutting edge gaming for next generation platforms, you have come to the right place, where everything is connected and held together by the common thread of passion for technology in all its aspects, and an unrelenting drive for perfection. Welcome to TechConnect.

TechConnect started in 1997, from the melting pot of several successful tech community web sites. Through the years, it has evolved into an internet company whose focus lies on technology reporting, gaming and online advertising.

TechConnect’s strength lies in the unique blend of skills and knowledge brought about by the varied and international nature of its employees. Hailing from across Europe, and from all walks of life, TechConnect employees are the lifeblood and heartbeat of the company, with their ideas, varied life experience and professional training.

Rooted in online publishing, with a core business firmly established in online advertising, and with a reach of services that encompasses all aspects of marketing and public relations, TechConnect’s portfolio of services is vast and complete, as well as being extremely successful and well regarded by the international community. No matter what your needs, aspirations or desires are, if it involves making it relevant, shaping it pretty and putting it out there for the world to see, you’ve come to the right place. Welcome to TechConnect.
